original_text: My purpose is not to bring trouble to you. You should not have pain while other people have plenty. Instead, both you and they should have enough.
korean_text: 이는 다른 사람들은 평안하게 하고 너희는 곤고하게 하려는 것이 아니요 균등하게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: My purpose is not to bring trouble to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내 목적은 당신에게 곤경을 가져다주는 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: You should not have pain while other people have plenty
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들이 풍요로울 때 당신이 고통을 겪어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, both you and they should have enough
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 당신과 그들 모두가 충분히 가져야 합니다
